name: Glerups The Shoe (Leather Sole) - Unisex
description: Slide your bare feet into these puppies and let the cozy felted wool work its magic. Handmade from a select blend of Danish and New Zealand wools, Glerups adjust to your foot shape after a few uses for a soft, comfortable fit. The Shoe's wool upper is highly breathable and naturally antimicrobial, so it won't absorb odours or perspiration. A double-thick felted midsole provides plush comfort underfoot, and the durable leather sole is great for indoor use. Wear your Glerups around the house or at the cabin.Felted wool upper is breathable and naturally antimicrobial.Glerups sources wool from suppliers who don't practice mulesing.Double-layered felted wool insole is durable and moulds to your foot shape, becoming more comfortable with each use.Vegetable-tanned leather soles are suitable for indoor use.Completely handmade.
